name: Cooking Discord
description:
Game is currently being hosted for testing at https://discord.gg/BwAQxV

A game to create scrambled eggs and toast with your friends in discord.
For controls type: $help and you will see

            Type $inv to see what you have in your inventory at any time.
           Type $search to spend time searching for an ingredient.
           Type $cook to spend time cooking an ingredient.
           Type $cook followed by the ingredients name to spend time cooking the ingredient.
           Type $sell followed by the ingredients name to sell the ingredient. Cooked ingredients are worth more than uncooked ingredients.
           Type $exch to buy the next level. levels reduce the amount of time it takes to do things

A game on discord made in 9 hours for the triple trijam from 7/3/2020-7/6/2020

Diversifiers
Community 🌎

  • Join the Trijam Discord and read the #rules channel!

Code 💻

  • Upload the source code of your project to your game's itch.io page!

Art 🎨

  • Edit the Theme of your itch.io game page and give it a custom color palette, background, and banner using assets from your game! Make sure to include some content on the game page itself too, like instructions for controls, explanation of themes and diversifiers, how much time was taken, which engine was used, links to any external assets that were used, anyone who worked on the game, etc.!

Design 🎲

  • Make a game that uses randomness!

Narrative 📕

  • Make a game where violence is not the answer!

Meta 🎮

  • Make a game in a genre you've never made a game in before!
